ai-patthana23.9:0.2_0: under the investigation of principles means to the extent of the Dhamma.
ai-patthana23.9:1.1_0: He doesn’t go towards the teaching, nor are skilled in accumulations.
ai-patthana23.9:2.1_0: He doesn’t go towards the decrease, nor is a condition for the sake of purification.
ai-patthana23.9:2.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana23.9:3.1_0: He doesn’t give rise to unskillful qualities that go towards increase.
ai-patthana23.9:3.1_2: the five hindrances are not clear.
